summary: Du-hyeon can't stand his wife anymore. He wants a divorce but he's weak. He hires a Casanova to seduce her and make her leave him. Will he succeed?
cast: Jo Han-Chul|Jeong-tae Kim|Ji-yeong Kim|Kwang-Soo Lee|Saeromi Lee|Sun-kyun Lee|Sung-min Lee|Soo-jung Lim|Myung-Ryul Nam|Hee-bon Park|Seung-ryong Ryu
keywords: divorce|husband wife relationship|remake|remake of argentinian film
title: Nae anaeui modeun geot
